item.description:
We're moving to Monday in Davis Square, at RedBones, 7pm.

On the agenda:
* Upcoming Wikiconference New York -- wikis take Boston as well?
* Wiki-intros at local universities and libraries -- follow up with Tufts from last month and the classics dept that's asking its PhD candidates to help put 30,000 items onto Wikisource.
* Wikimedia US presence in Gdansk: preparing for next July
* updates from the Paris Multimedia usability / "hacking Wikimedia Commons" workshop this past weekend

call for any late rsvp's, if we have more than 8ppl I'll get a table downstairs!
SJ
617 529 4266
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a black Wikimania shirt on, at a table upstairs.
item.name: The Boston Wikipedia December Meetup
